Articles.Content: Maybe a stupid question, but i read that you can refuel a ship, but how can you do that?

dock with another ship, alt+RMB first one tank then the other, then click "IN" on the tank you want filled

http://wiki.kerbalspaceprogram.com/wiki/Fuel_transfer#Flow.2C_transfer_and_crossfeed
you must have more than one fuel tank. Alt+Right click fuel tank A and Fuel tank B a pop up should appear that has buttons for In and Out, happy transferring.

Dock with another ship, if you right click on either the supply fuel tank or the one being filled then hold shift down and right click on the other tank you get the option of transferring fuel (and oxidizer as a separate click, note that if you don't want to transfer all the fuel possible then you probably need to figure out exactly how much of each to transfer).
I refuel with Red Bull and Muncho's.
... You necro'd this just to say that?
